item.title: PlayStation Takes $100 Off PS5 For Black Friday Sales
item.content:encoded:
PlayStation has announced its Black Friday sales as the holiday shopping season is set to kick off in North America. The sale will start promptly on Friday, November 21 and run until December 1, with players able to get $100 off the cost of a new PS5 console and a new PS VR2 headset, deals on PS Plus subscriptions, PS5 accessories, PlayStation merch, and more.

On the hardware side, the big discounts are the $100 off a new PS5 console and PS VR2 headset, though other notable discounts include $20 off the Pulse Elite headphones and $30 off the Pulse Explore earbuds. You can also grab a new DualSense controller for $20 off, and if you want to jump to the DualSense Edge, you'll be able to grab it for $30 off. There's also a $20 off discount on the accessibility-focused Access controller, and $20 off a new PlayStation Portal.

For the PS Plus discounts, you'll be able to get 33% off a 12-month PS Plus subscription for each of the three tiers. If you're already in the middle of a PS Plus subscription, you'll be able to get 33% off the remainder of your subscription if you want to upgrade from your current tier to the Extra or Premium tier.

There are also discounts on PS merchandise, with 60% off merchandise in a sitewide sale, and lastly, of course, there are hundreds of games on sale on the PlayStation Store once the sale kicks off this Friday.

If you're looking for other Black Friday deals, the Epic Games Store has already kicked off its sale.

Follow Wccftech on Google to get more of our news coverage in your feeds.



https://wccftech.com/playstation-takes-100-off-ps5-for-black-friday-sales/

item.title: Epic Games Store Opens Black Friday/Cyber Monday ‘Premium Editions Sale’, Now with Gifting
item.content:encoded:
The Epic Games Store has just opened a special 'Premium Editions Sale for Black Friday and Cyber Monday. The sale is live from now through Tuesday, December 2, at 11 AM Eastern Time / 4 PM Greenwich Mean Time / 5 PM Central European Time.

As you might easily surmise from its title, this Epic Games Store sale is centered on discounts of up to 80% for Premium, Deluxe, and Complete editions. This means the prices won't be as low as those of a standard edition, but on the other hand, customers will receive a complete game with expansions/DLCs, season passes, skins, weapons, and other digital bonuses, depending on the title. Here's a list of some of the best discounted games you'll find in this sale:

  • Battlefield 6 Phantom Edition - €85 (15% off)
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Deluxe Edition - €47.99 (20% off)
  • Dying Light: The Beast Deluxe Edition - €55.99 (20% off)
  • God of War Ragnarök Digital Deluxe Edition - €55.99 (20% off)
  • Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Digital Deluxe Edition - €55.99 (20% off)
  • Stellar Blade Complete Edition - €71.99 (20% off)
  • Hell is Us Deluxe Edition - €55.99 (20% off)
  • Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - 2-Year Anniversary Edition - €89.99 (25% off)
  • S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl Ultimate Edition - €76.99 (30% off)
  • Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Digital Deluxe Edition - €62.99 (30% off)
  • Ready or Not: Digital Deluxe Edition - €41.99 (40% off)
  • Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition - €39.99 (50% off)
  • The Last of Us Part I - Digital Deluxe Edition - €34.99 (50% off)
  • Fallout 4: Game of the Year Edition - €15.99 (60% off)
  • The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition - €16.49 (67% off)
  • Alan Wake 2 Deluxe Edition - €20.99 (70% off)
  • Red Dead Redemption 2: Ultimate Edition - €19.99 (80% off)
  • Hogwarts Legacy: Digital Deluxe Edition - €10.49 (85% off)
  • Dead Space Digital Deluxe Edition - €10.49 (85% off)

Epic Rewards are also temporarily (through January 8, 2026) boosted from 5% to 20% for all games purchased on the Epic Games Store with Epic's payment system. Lastly, Epic has finally implemented the long-requested gifting functionality on the store, though there are some limitations. You can find a detailed FAQ page here.

Follow Wccftech on Google to get more of our news coverage in your feeds.



https://wccftech.com/epic-games-store-opens-black-friday-cyber-monday-premium-editions-sale-now-with-gifting/
